author: Ashgreen1992
title: Grinder
text: Glitch weapon of random type 3 glitch weapons * Moonstone grinds are not possible. Legendary weapon of random type 3 legendary weapons of any type (same type gives random legendary) * Moonstone grinds are not possible. Legendary weapon of desired type 1 purple weapon of desired type + 2 legendary weapons * Moonstone grinds are not possible with grinds using Claptastic Voyage legendaries.* Without moonstones, there is a chance of getting a purple weapon.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. Purple weapon of desired type 2 purple weapons of the desired type + 1 additional purple weapon * Moonstone grinds are not possible.* There is a chance of getting a Legendary weapon. Purple weapon of random type 3 purple weapons of different types * Moonstone grinds are not possible.* There is a chance of getting a Legendary weapon. Purple weapon of desired type 2 blue weapons of desired type + 1 Additional blue weapon * Without moonstones, there is a chance of getting a blue weapon.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. Purple weapon of random type 3 blue weapons of different types * Without moonstones, there is a chance of getting a blue weapon.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. Blue weapon of desired type 2 green weapons of desired type + 1 additional green weapon * Without moonstones, there is a chance of getting a green weapon.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. Blue weapon of random type 3 green weapons of different types * Without moonstones, there is a chance of getting a green weapon.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. Green weapon of desired type 2 white weapons of desired type + 1 additional white weapon * Without moonstones, there is a chance of getting a white weapon.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. Green weapon of random type 3 white weapons of different types * Without moonstones, there is a chance of getting a white weapon.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. 1 SMG + 1 Sniper Rifle + 1 Shield , all of the same rarity * Input must be blue or below. Output rarity will be the same or one higher than the input rarity.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. Rocket Launcher 2 weapons + 1 Grenade Mod , all of the same rarity * Input must be blue or below. Output rarity will be the same or one higher than the input rarity.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. Shotgun 1 Pistol + 1 SMG + 1 Shield , all of the same rarity * Input must be blue or below. Output rarity will be the same or one higher than the input rarity.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. 1 Assault Rifle + 1 Pistol + 1 Shield , all of the same rarity * Input must be blue or below. Output rarity will be the same or one higher than the input rarity.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. 1 Assault Rifle + 1 Shotgun + 1 Shield , all of the same rarity * Input must be blue or below. Output rarity will be the same or one higher than the input rarity.* With moonstones, there is a chance of getting a Luneshine bonus. Shields, Oz Kits, Class Mods & Grenade Mods Output
